We offer these durable, disposable and upscale quality plastic table skirts to solve the budgetary challenges usually faced by professional party planners and organizers.

Quantity: 1

How to care: Skirts are machine washable. Use warm water wash, low temp dry.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Premium quality polyester table skirts with stylish pleats are a perfect choice to accommodate all your indoor and outdoor table decorating needs. The top quality polyester material is sturdy and durable enough to withstand the heavy duty usage during outdoor carnivals, culinary events, weddings, as well as indoor tea parties, birthdays, and holiday dinners. The classy pleated design adds a visual element to any table settings while giving a protective and decorative effect to your banquet or wedding tables. Pair these with matching tablecloths, table overlays, table runners, and napkins to create a perfectly exotic party ambiance.

Additional Information:

  • Material : Polyester
  • Quantity : 1
  • Color : Chocolate
  • Measurements : 21ft wide x 29" tall
  • All table skirts come with velcro on top for attachment to clips.
  • Clips are sold separately
  • How to care : Skirts are machine washable. Use warm water wash, low temp dry.
  • Tablecloth and decorations are not included.
  • Uses : Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

    Guideline to choosing the right size:

    • 14ft Skirts : Covers 3 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 10 clips recommended
    • 17ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 15 clips recommended, Covers 3 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table

entry.title: 12 PCS 0.6" Adjustable Large Plastic Table Skirt Clips
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2240
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 6.68

[About]

Plastic table skirt clips - adjustable sizing.
Clips has Velcro on the back to attach on the table skirts easily.
Size: fits 0.6" - 0.8" thickness (1.5 - 2 cm)
Each order will contain a package of 12 clips.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Table skirting not only hides those ugly, dreary table legs, but also transforms an ordinary party table into an elegant tablescape. With tulle, organza, satin, taffeta, or polyester table skirts dressing your party tables up lavishly, your party decoration will surpass the most sophisticated of celebrations. Let these pretty table skirts be glamming your party ambiance up for longer hours and many more festivities by using our durable plastic table skirt clips. These premium quality plastic clips will hold your table skirts perfectly without any risk of breaking or cracking. The Velcro on the back of clips helps in easy attachment and excellent grip retention.

Additional Information:

  • Plastic table skirt clips - adjustable sizing.
  • Clips has Velcro on the back to attach on the table skirts easily. 
  • Size: fits 0.6" - 0.8" thickness (1.5 - 2 cm)
  • Each order will contain a package of 12 clips.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
